meaningMnemonic: An altered <radical>bird</radical> is a <kanji>crow</kanji>! They look like birds but they're bigger and darker and smarter!
readingMnemonic: If you can't tell just from looking at it that it's a <kanji>crow</kanji> and not a bird, walk up to it and <reading>caress</reading> (からす) it with your hand! If it caresses you back, it's a crow! If it freaks out and flies away or pecks your face, it's a normal bird. Crows are really smart and like affection. That's what makes them so cool!
